title: Hi Only Corki (God) story time here about smurfing
body:
So I'm smurfing, you know how it is, ganking and banking, anyways, im playing karma support, i end up with 250 more ap then mid and carry like the God I am, I say in all chat "When the support is actually the mid" anyways this unleashes my mids inner salt LEL, says "I'm going afk if you report this Karma" enemy team "ok yes ty for this" LOL, btw this isn't even silver it's like gold 3 elo. Anyways i got reported and the annie AFK'd was pretty funny story I think, probably the funniest thing about it all is idgaf about the loss and it isn't even my account. But serious though I knew low elo were all down syndrome but this is some next level autism. 

Anyways hope you enjoyed only corki (God) story ty.

replies.body: How are you not banned already?
You don't care so much about the loss that you decided to post it on the forums. hmmmm.
